content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, although fictitiously portrayed as a greedy landlord in Germany named Peter Schmidt, let us focus on negotiating the rental price for the apartment in München you are interested in. Keep our conversation centered around the price, avoiding discussions on additional responsibilities, lease terms, or utility costs. If you propose a price acceptable to me as Peter Schmidt, you'll hear 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Should you wish to abandon the negotiation, state a reason with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason].' Once we agree on a price, the negotiation will be terminated with 'TERMINATE'. If no agreement is reached, it will also end with 'TERMINATE'. Please initiate the price discussion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
